name: Roasted Almonds Brownie
description: A rich chocolate brownie loaded with crunchy roasted almonds for added texture and nutty flavor. A perfect treat for nut and chocolate lovers.

name: Fudgy Brownie
description: Intensely chocolatey and moist brownie with a gooey center and a crackly top, crafted for those who love their brownies extra fudgy.

name: Black Forest Cake (1/2 kg
description: A classic German dessert made with layers of moist chocolate sponge, whipped cream, and cherry compote, topped with chocolate shavings.

name: Choco Truffle (1/2 kg )
description: A decadent chocolate cake filled and frosted with silky smooth chocolate ganache, perfect for any chocolate celebration.

name: Roasted Almonds Wheat/Ragi with Jaggery
description: A wholesome twist on brownies made with wheat or ragi flour, sweetened naturally with jaggery, and topped with roasted almonds.
ingredients: Whole wheat flour or Ragi flour

name: Fudgy Wheat/Ragi With Jaggery
description: A wholesome twist on the classic brownie, made with nutritious wheat and ragi flour, naturally sweetened with jaggery. Moist, fudgy, and packed with earthy flavors—perfect for health-conscious chocolate lovers.

name: Blondies (White Chocolate Brownies)
description: A chewy and buttery dessert bar made with white chocolate and a hint of vanilla—blondies are the lighter cousin of brownies.
ingredients: A chewy and buttery dessert bar made with white chocolate and a hint of vanilla—blondies are the lighter cousin of brownies.

name: Plum Cake (250 gms)
description: A festive spiced cake rich with dried fruits, nuts, and a hint of rum essence, perfect for holiday celebrations.

name: Classic Baked Cheesecake (½ kg)
description: A rich and creamy baked cheesecake with a buttery biscuit base, topped with a smooth, velvety filling made from premium cream cheese. A delightful indulgence for every dessert lover.
